text: Bodil Skjånes Dugstad (23 May 1927 – 6 February 2021) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. Dugstad was born in Trondheim. She was a deputy representative to the Norwegian Parliament from 1973 to 1977. From 1973 to 1975, he was Ministry of Church Affairs and Education. Dugstad died on 6 February 2021 in Oslo, aged 93.Bodil Skjånes Dugstad er død (in Norwegian) ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Bodil Skjånes Dugstad
